name: MatCrash
description:
In the game, you need to destroy the figures in order not to collide with them. You can collect and use various bonuses: slowdown, explosion, freeze, shield. The game has realistic destruction physics! There is an endless level with map generation.

Press the numbers on the keyboard (1, 2, 3) to choose which shape material to destroy and click the same color on the shape in front of you to break it. Click on the bonus icons to use them. Hold down the right mouse button to speed up.
